price: Maka dia keluar dari mihrab menuju kaumnya, lalu dia memberi isyarat kepada mereka; bertasbihlah kamu pada waktu pagi dan petang.
arabic: فَخَرَجَ عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلۡمِحۡرَابِ فَأَوۡحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِمۡ أَن سَبِّحُواْ بُكۡرَةٗ وَعَشِيّٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fakharaja ʿalā qawmihi mina al-miḥ'rābi fa-awḥā ilayhim an sabbiḥū buk'ratan waʿashiyyan
